name: 林信標

2nd-3rd week Pulse Modulation

14th~17th week OFDM Transmission and applications

materials:
1. Introduction to Analog & Digital Communication, 2nd Edition
2. Communication Systems, 5th Edition
Simon Haykin and Michael Moher
